Translations.Text: Tala ideg tessen ixdimen n Oebbi, aman is pfeggiven
Ppaiiafen di tuqqna, ugaden ass ideg lhemm immebruzzaa
Ppaken lqut, ilmend n lemeibba S, i igellil, i ugujil, i umeebus
F udem n Oebbi kan, ay kwen necceccay. Ur neb$i segwen tiririt ne$ tajmilt
Nekwni, ih, nugad Mass nne$, ass awaaoan, aqessean
Isellek iten Oebbi si lhemm n wassen. Ccbaea, lfeoe, Ifka yasen
Ikufa ten af wayen ueboen: leonan, leerir
Ad eelen din af imieoeen; ur pwalin iiij, asemmiv
Tili ines $uosen, izwayen waan asen
A sen tezzin ibuqalen n lfeiia, lkisan ulelluc
Alelluc n lfeiia; taceot nnsen, s lmizan
Dinna sswan asen lkas n wayen iwumi xelien skenjbir
Dinna tala; Salsabil i s ssawalen
Ilmeeiyen imezgiyen tezzin asen. Ma twalav ten, ad as tiniv d tiyuqat imfaoaqen
Ma tmuqlev ar din, a pwaliv ssaad akked tgelda meqqwoen
Iceiiiven i llsan d leerir aecici ieewwcen; imeqqyasen n lfeiia; Isswa ten Mass nnsen, s tissit iufan
Ih, wagi d arraz nnwen, u d tajmilt igiten nnwen
D Nekwni, s tidep, i k id Issersen Leqwoan, s lmizan
Eubeo i ueuddu n Mass ik; segsen, ur teccev, ur jehhel
Mmekti d isem n Mass ik, tafrara, tameddit
